price: 107. Dheh: Rumeeya (Qur’aanka) ama ha rumaynina. kuwa la siiyey cilmiga isaga horti28 (ee ah Yuhuudda iyo Nasaarada soo Islaamay), marka loo akhriyo, waxay ula dhacaan wejiyadooda sujuud.
arabic: قُلۡ ءَامِنُواْ بِهِۦٓ أَوۡ لَا تُؤۡمِنُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦٓ إِذَا يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ يَخِرُّونَۤ لِلۡأَذۡقَانِۤ سُجَّدٗاۤ
footnotes: 28. Dadka wanaagsan ee ku jira Ehlu Kitaabka ee garta xaqa ku sugan Qur’aanka.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul āminū bihi aw lā tu'minū inna alladhīna ūtū al-ʿil'ma min qablihi idhā yut'lā ʿalayhim yakhirrūna lil'adhqāni sujjadan
